title: VATPAVE Mens Casual Hawaiian Floral Shirts Short Sleeve Button Down Tropical Shirts Beach Summer Shirts
description: Machine Wash Cold, Air Dry,Do Not Bleach
This lightweight fabric make it a great option year-round and never goes out of style
All over flowers prints add tropical appeal to this casual aloha beach shirt,and make this button-up shirt a go-to pick for any occasion
Since the material will be slightly shrunk after washed,if you prefer loose fit order one size up than tag size
